scripts.install-web3: cd web3 && yarn install && yarn add -D @nomicfoundation/hardhat-network-helpers@^1.0.0 @nomicfoundation/hardhat-chai-matchers@^1.0.0 @nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers@^2.0.0 @nomiclabs/hardhat-etherscan@^3.0.0 @types/chai@^4.2.0 @types/mocha@>=9.1.0 @typechain/ethers-v5@^10.1.0 @typechain/hardhat@^6.1.2 chai@^4.2.0 hardhat-gas-reporter@^1.0.8 solidity-coverage@^0.8.1 ts-node@>=8.0.0 typechain@^8.1.0 typescript@>=4.5.0
scripts.install-all: npm run install-app && npm run install-web3
